items.sentence: Tom said he couldn\'t loan any money to Mary.
I\'ve already told Tom that Mary isn\'t here.
Let\'s have a serious talk about your future.
Let\'s not fool ourselves about that project.
Tom can\'t do it alone. You need to help him.
Tom is only interested in good-looking girls.
Tom is out buying me some things I asked for.
Tom is out in the yard, playing with our dog.
I was able to succeed because of your advice.
I was able to swim faster when I was younger.
I was in Boston for almost the entire summer.
I was looking for Tom, but he found me first.
I was pretty fortunate to be able to do that.
Tom falls asleep as soon as he gets into bed.
Tom fell asleep as soon as the movie started.

Tom felt it was important that you know this.
Tom finally made up his mind to ask Mary out.
